tools

Class BeerInformationFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.BeerInformationFormatter

  • public class BeerInformationFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    This static class defines some methods used to modify the beer information found on the TapHunter site. This is used to format the data so that it can be properly used and then later inserted into the database.
    Author:
    treyhowie

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BeerInformationFormatter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String abvFormat(java.lang.String abv)
      This method formats the abv value for a specific beer so that the percent sign is removed.
      static java.lang.String ibuFormat(java.lang.String ibu)
      This method formats the ibu value for a specific beer so that the percent sign is removed.
      static java.lang.String[] locationFormat(java.lang.String text)
      This method splits a location up so that it can be easily added to the location table.
      static java.lang.String priceFormat(java.lang.String price)
      This method removes the dollar sign from a price value so that it can be inserted into the database as an integer value.
      static java.lang.String[] splitNameAndNumber(java.lang.String text)
      This method is used to split a beer name and the number associated with it, on the TaoHunter site, so that they can be used to order the beers and have their name in the proper format for insertion into the db.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeerInformationFormatter

        public BeerInformationFormatter()

    • Method Detail

      • splitNameAndNumber

        public static java.lang.String[] splitNameAndNumber(java.lang.String text)
        This method is used to split a beer name and the number associated with it, on the TaoHunter site, so that they can be used to order the beers and have their name in the proper format for insertion into the db.
        Parameters:
        text - - String that contains the beer name and its respective number on the menu
        Returns:
        String[] - an array of size 2 where the menu number is at position 1 and the beer name is at position 2.

      • abvFormat

        public static java.lang.String abvFormat(java.lang.String abv)
        This method formats the abv value for a specific beer so that the percent sign is removed. This is used so that the abv value can be inserted as a double value into the database.
        Parameters:
        abv - - String that is the abv value
        Returns:
        String - the abv value without the percent sign

      • ibuFormat

        public static java.lang.String ibuFormat(java.lang.String ibu)
        This method formats the ibu value for a specific beer so that the percent sign is removed. This is used so that the ibu value can be inserted as a double value into the database.
        Parameters:
        ibu - - String that is the ibu value
        Returns:
        String - the ibu value without the percent sign

      • priceFormat

        public static java.lang.String priceFormat(java.lang.String price)
        This method removes the dollar sign from a price value so that it can be inserted into the database as an integer value.
        Parameters:
        price - - String that denotes the price
        Returns:
        String - price value without the dollar sign

      • locationFormat

        public static java.lang.String[] locationFormat(java.lang.String text)
        This method splits a location up so that it can be easily added to the location table.
        Parameters:
        text - - String that denotes the location
        Returns:
        String[] - an array that has City, State, Zip split into three indices
